Welcome to my page! My name is Zhenze Huang 黃臻澤. I am a Ph.D. student in the Department of Government and Politics at University of Maryland, College Park. 

I specialize in International Relations and Comparative Politics. My research primarily centers on the domestic politics of foreign policy and political economy of authoritarian institution, with a regional focus on China and East Asia. 

I received my B.A. degree in International Affairs and Political Science (double major) with honors from George Washington University and a M.A. degree in China Studies and International Economics from Johns Hopkins School of Advanced International Studies.
